modName: Bosmer Armor Pack High Res (Weapon DSR Patch)
summary: A quick fix for the Bosmer Armor Mod by maty743. This patches the issue with the Dagger weapon not showing left hand weapong or sheath on back or hip while uses Dual Sheath Redux and XMPS.
descriptionHtml:
[center]A quick fix for the Bosmer Armor Mod by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2215129]maty743[/url]. This patches the issue with the Dagger weapon not showing left hand weapon or sheath on back or hip while uses Dual Sheath Redux and XMPS. All rights and Ownership goes to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2215129]maty743[/url] for creating the resources and assets.

Original mod REQUIRED
Bosmer Armor - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37289]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37289[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2215129]maty743[/url][/center][center]
[img width=789,height=447]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/85432-0-1500483385.png[/img][/center]
author: Smokh

files.name: Bosmer Armor Pack High Res - DSR Patch
